blockchains.name: XPLA
blockchains.description: XPLA is a blockchain platform designed to support decentralized applications (dApps) with a focus on providing a robust and scalable infrastructure. It offers enhanced interoperability and security features, making it suitable for a wide range of use cases, including DeFi, NFTs, and gaming.

blockchains.name: KYVE
blockchains.description: KYVE, the Web3 data lake solution, is a protocol that enables data providers to standardize, validate, and permanently store blockchain data streams.

blockchains.name: Juno
blockchains.description: Juno is a decentralized, community-driven Layer 1 blockchain built on the Cosmos SDK, designed for the efficient deployment of interoperable smart contracts using the CosmWasm framework.

blockchains.name: Bitcanna
blockchains.description: BitCanna is a blockchain network designed to provide a decentralized payment solution and supply chain management for the legal cannabis industry. BitCanna aims to streamline financial operations, enhance transparency, and build trust among consumers and businesses in the cannabis sector.

blockchains.name: Nibiru
blockchains.description: Nibiru is a decentralized finance platform. Nibiru hosts a variety of ecosystem partners in a wide variety of consumer sectors. From RWAs (Coded Estate) to DeFi (Constella, NOM) to Gaming (Blockchain Game Alliance, IntoTheVerse), Nibiru is advancing multiple emerging blockchain narratives that will onboard the next billion users.

blockchains.name: Sputnik Network
blockchains.description: Sputnik Network App-Chain is the part of future PostState Blockchain Sputnik Network will be Cosmos Ecosystem Hub to send and recieve crypto, and also to recieve airdrops: InterChain Accounts; Ranking users by the received airdrops with predefined parameters; Provide lists of stakers for Cosmos Ecosystem projects to distribute airdrops; Helping users to claim or recieve airdrops; Sending transactions to list of users by addresses or username of Telegram, Twitter, Discord; A simple tool for scheduling and distributing airdrops.

blockchains.name: Ocean Nodes
blockchains.description: The tool to enhance AI capabilities and make the most computational resources.

communityContributions.description: Helping delegators to get rewards with minimal commissions.
Assisting community members with technical issues, helping them understand and navigate the blockchain network.
Taking apart in workshops and webinars to educate the community about blockchain technology, its benefits, and how to participate in the network.
Creating and sharing guides that make it easier for others to use and contribute to the blockchain network
Participating in network governance by voting on proposals and changes, ensuring that community voices are heard and considered
By maintaining decentralized networks, validators empower individuals with greater control over their personal data and financial assets.

technicalContributions.description: Verifing the validity of transactions submitted to the blockchain, ensuring they follow the network's rules and preventing double-spending.
Implementation and testing software updates and upgrades to improve the network's functionality, security, and performance.
No slashing, 100% return in case of slashing.
Development of new services and help the community to use new services.
Installing nodes on the most resilient servers in the most appropriate locations.
